review: Its rare that I would buy an early access game but from all the good things i was hearing plus it was on sale, I bought it and MY GOD THIS GAME IS BEAUTIFUL, definetly one of the best early access games out there :)
This is a very good game to play for those who like dayz or rust. Even though this game is still in early access its free and enjoyable.
Good for players who like a challenge and also good for classic players (who like zombies that is).
this is a really good game
